channel.title: Recoloring
channel.description:
I never really looked into it before, and i'm trying to find out how to recolor items.
For instance I want to recolor any bar (smithing wise) to red, green, black, and white. and i'm not entirely sure how to go about it. If someone could give me a brief explanation that'd be awesome :3
